title: âš¡Ricky Ponting Reveals Reason Behind Joining Punjab Kings, Hopeful About Winning IPL Trophy
body: After his tenure with the Delhi Capitals ended in July 2024, Ponting led the Washington Freedom to a title-winning campaign in the Major League Cricket (MLC). Ponting admitted that he was disappointed about his time ending with the Delhi Capitals after seven years that he spent with the franchise.
summary:
* Ricky Ponting led the Washington Freedom to a title-winning campaign in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament.

(Note: There is no additional relevant information about the MLC tournament in the provided article.)
